* D leaned back and sighed with frustration. She hadn't gotten it at all! To 
Hell with his limited speech!
D pawed at the ground.*

" No."

* He had to find just the right words or they could be at this all day, and 
it might take him a while before he could say just what he meant. But he 
made it a goal to learn how to speak more in the future.
D looked at Fenox for a second, not angry at her for not understanding but 
was frustrated.
He searched his mind like mad.*

" Where hu-man flesh...um...like me?"

* That wasn't exactly right either. D sat back. What to do?!
Wait! He bolted upright, his ears straight in the air. Maybe he didn't have 
to speak to them at all! His speech might be in need of work but his writing 
was something that was perfect.
D snapped his head down to look at the ground as he scribbled just what he 
wanted to say in the dirt of the island.
She HAD to understand!
After he was through D pointed to the words, looking from Fenox to them and 
back again.
On the ground he had wrote: Where are the humans I had come here with?*
